title: Communications Lead, DACH & CEE (Contract)
content:
Airbnb was born in 2007 when two Hosts welcomed three guests to their San Francisco home, and has since grown to over 4 million Hosts who have welcomed more than 1 billion guest arrivals in almost every country across the globe. Every day, Hosts offer unique stays and experiences that make it possible for guests to connect with communities in a more authentic way.The Community You Will Join:
The communications team is responsible for telling the Airbnb story around the world. Whether we are briefing press on inspiring travel trends, highlighting unique experiences led by local hosts, or explaining how travel on our platform benefits local families and communities, we are the voice of Airbnb on a broad range of topics. 
We're a fast-growing and high-energy team with a passion for people, places and great stories. If you'd like to be part of one of the world's greatest communications teams, come tell us your story.
The Difference You will Make:
Based in Berlin, the Communications Lead, DACH & CEE will be responsible for the overarching communications strategy across Germany, Austria, Switzerland and Central Eastern Europe (focus: Czechia, Poland, Hungary). Reporting into the EMEA Head of Communications, the role will lead the DACH & CEE communications team, driving communications initiatives that support our consumer, policy and corporate-related goals in the region. The role will ensure that communications activities support the needs of the regional business, as well as being in line with global priorities.
You must be comfortable working in a global company across multiple stakeholders, building effective communications plans across all comms functions, corporate, consumer and policy and you must be adept at managing a highly talented and driven team of comms professionals. Weâ€™re looking for a passionate, articulate and savvy communicator who can work under pressure within tight deadlines, and engage a range of audiences, from Gen Z to Seniors.
A Typical Day: 

Leads the DACH & CEE Communications Team, setting a Communications strategy and plan that aligns with the global and regional strategy 
Oversees the development and execution of market plans supporting Consumer Communications, Corporate and Policy Communications, and Editorial Communications 
Takes global and regional strategies and priorities and turns them into communications plans that meet local business needs
Provides Communications strategic advice and counsel to the DACH & CEE leadership team
Drives high standards in work across the market and ensures results are measurable
Motivates and leads the team to originate creative communications approaches 
Responsible for ensuring effective cross functional collaboration with other departments and within the overall policy & communications department
Responsible for maintaining a clear organizational structure for the comms team and overall team performance

Your Expertise:

Brand building Consumer PR experience, including news generation, events, newsjacking and influencer marketing
Corporate and / or policy comms experience, either working in a communications agency or in-house
Fluent German and English is mandatory
Excellent writing and strong verbal communications and interpersonal skills
Experience in media relations with an established media network
A strong and effective people manager with proven ability to lead and develop teams effectively
Offers deep expertise to provide strategic communications approaches to the biggest and most business critical problems and projects. Regularly creates holistic strategies and narratives for newsworthy stories 
Forward thinking, innovative and creative - proactively shares perspective at all levels of the organization
Able to build successful relationships with senior stakeholders across the business; Has outstanding presence when dealing with executives and a strong ability to influence business decisions
Always thinking several steps ahead to anticipate where the business is going and how comms can adapt itself to best support
Ability to inspire and motivate team members to deliver major press moments and campaigns
Excellent problem solver with ability to unblock the most complex situations and facilitate drama-free environments

This position is a fixed-term contract (FTC) for 12 months.
Our Commitment To Inclusion & Belonging:
Airbnb is committed to working with the broadest talent pool possible. We believe diverse ideas foster innovation and engagement, and allow us to attract creatively-led people, and to develop the best products, services and solutions. All qualified individuals are encouraged to apply.

questions.description:
Airbnb is committed to creating a diverse workplace. In order to measure our efforts in this regard, we invite applicants to self-identify as to their gender. Answering to this question is entirely voluntary and declining to provide this information will not subject you to adverse treatment or retaliation. The response that you do provide will be maintained confidential and will not be shared with hiring managers. In turn, Airbnb will anonymize the information related to your gender, so that once it is collected it will not be possible to relate it, directly or indirectly, to you.

All individuals seeking employment at Airbnb are considered without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, age, sex, marital status, ancestry, physical or mental disability, veteran status, gender identity, sexual orientation, or any other legally protected characteristic. You are being given the opportunity to provide such information in order to help us measure our own diversity and inclusion efforts and to comply with our internal equal employment opportunity standards.

All of your personal information, including your gender should you choose to provide it, will be collected, stored and processed in accordance with the Airbnb Privacy Notice.
